Text:
@Loki_uk

An iso is a "disc image file", which I think speaks for itself, especially if you read the torrent's notes.
Nice quality and decent d/l speed too. Had to run m2ts file through Handbrake to shave off the extra Mbs to run it off PS3's HDD (damn FAT32 limitation). Big thanks.

Still downloading, but looks good, and good Resolution/bitrate. 

Thanks :)!
